credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Drawing
medium: Pencil, pen, ink, brush, various water colors, paper
description: Horizontal rectangle. At left is a wash stand with three legs. In the center is a vanity table, shown obliquely, with four lion feet in green bronze. Ornaments are of the same material, so are the brackets and parts of the cresting. At right is a chair, shown obliquely, in profile. Base line. The framing line is partly cut away.
name: Drawing
